content: this pattern is also available for free at peachandpaige com this highly detailed and illustrated crochet pattern will take through every step to make a gorgeous farmhouse style stocking with ribbed folded cuff berry stitch texture and pom pom tie this pattern has instructions for both a standard size and mini size stocking pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology this listing is for an instant pdf download for the berry beautiful stocking pattern is made using 10 ply/worsted weight/number 4 wool and requires a 5 5mm and 6mm hook you can easily substitute for a heavier or lighter weight yarn and recommended hook size if following gauge in the pattern final stockings measure standard - height 47cm width 15cm mini - height 22cm width 10cm skill level easy- beginner to work this pattern you need to know how to - work in the round using magic loop and working flat row single_crochet half_double_crochet and double_crochet stitches working in back loop step by step instructions included for the berry stitch this listing is not a finished product you will not receive finished stockings if you buy this listing there will be no refund for purchases made in error unless the item has not yet been downloaded all of our patterns include many pictures gauge abbreviation keys stitch counts and extra notes to help explain if you have any questions about the pattern please feel free to contact us -----------instant download link will be emailed to you once payment has cleared--------------- this listing is for the pattern only not the finished item the pattern and photographs contained in this document are property of peach&paige this pattern is available for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is allowed products made from this pattern may be sold please follow peach&paige on instagram and facebook facebook com/peachandpaige instagram com/peachandpaige
